thread.section_title: Hilton Garden Inn New York/Midtown Park Ave - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Best hotel ever!
thread.title_full: Best hotel ever! - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York/Midtown Park Ave, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Alexandra M
title: Best hotel ever!
text: Clean, quiet, friendly staff, very nice location. Does not even feel like you are in the hotel. Located close to metro, nice restaurants, Empire State building. Very friendly staff, always ready to help. The cleaning ladies were always polite and did a great job. Best hotel I ever stayed in NYC.
